Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 3a: Infrastructure hooks, event bus, and Supabase schema

Extract 6 architectural patterns from useMCPConnection into lightweight
offline-first hooks for progress tracking, auth, and sync:

- eventBus.ts: typed pub-sub singleton for cross-component decoupling
- useSupabaseAuth.ts: auth state machine \(idle/loading/authenticated/anonymous\)
- useGameSession.ts: ref-based session tracking \(no re-renders on tick\)
- useProgressSync.ts: debounced Supabase sync with online/offline awareness
- progressStore.ts: extend with session metrics \(duration, phases, device tier\)
- supabase.ts: add upsertProgress/getChildProgress typed helpers
- game.ts: add AuthStatus, SyncStatus, GameSession, ProgressRow types
- count-to-five/page.tsx: wire session tracking and progress recording
- 001_initial_schema.sql: profiles, children, progress tables with RLS

Build: 329KB game page \(66% of 500KB budget\), +2KB from Phase 2.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
